segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, and it’s actually kind of beautiful in a weird way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way it cascades down the cabinets looks almost artistic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s in some kind of trance or just really focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and I can’t help but smile at their determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so high, and the girl is just waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the scene contrasts the chaos inside with the calm garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like two different worlds colliding in one kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost want to laugh at how absurd this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I also hope no one gets hurt in the process.
segments.speaker: PAR
